translation.en: LOSING DIANA WAS LIKE LOSING A PART OF ME.
translation.ko: 다이애나를 잃은 건 내 일부를 잃은 것과 같았다

translation.en: NOTHING COULD CHANGE I THOUGHT THE WAY WE FELT ABOUT EACH OTHER.
translation.ko: 우리 사랑은 그 무엇도 바꾸지 못할 줄 알았다

translation.en: WE WERE INVINCIBLE. I THOUGHT
SOMEONE ONCE SAID, IF YOU WANT SOMETHING VERY BADLY,
translation.ko: 누군가 말했다 진정 원하는 것이 있다면

translation.en: SET IT FREE.
IF IT COMES BACK TO YOU, IT'S YOURS FOREVER.
IF IT DOESN'T, IT WAS NEVER YOURS TO BEGIN WITH.

translation.en: I KNEW ONE THING.

translation.en: I WAS DAVID'S TO BEGIN WITH,
translation.ko: 한 가지는 확실하다 난 원래 데이빗의 것이었고 데이빗은 내 것이었다

translation.en: AND HE WAS MINE.
♪ YOU LIGHT UP MY LIFE... ♪
WE MET IN HIGH SCHOOL. [DIANA]
DAVID WAS A SENIOR AND I WAS A FRESHMAN.
ON WEDNESDAYS AFTER GLEE CLUB,
HE'D DRIVE ME AND MY BEST FRIEND HOME FROM SCHOOL.
translation.ko: 데이빗이 나와 내 친구를 집에 데려다줬다

translation.en: I USED TO WATCH HIM
IN THE REAR-VIEW MIRROR. I FELL IN LOVE WITH HIS EYES.
DAVID PROPOSED TO ME WHEN I WAS 19, AT PARADISE COVE. ON THE PIER
translation.ko: 열아홉 살 때 데이빗이 파라다이스 코브 부두에서 청혼했다

translation.en: OUR PARENTS WERE AGAINST IT.
WE WERE TOO YOUNG. THEY SAID
translation.ko: 우린 너무 어리고 서로를 잘 모른다고

translation.en: DIDN'T KNOW EACH OTHER. WE REALLY
translation.ko: 우린 너무 어리고 서로를 잘 모른다고 데이빗은 모험 없는 삶은 삶이 아니라고 했다

translation.en: THAT A LIFE WITHOUT RISK BUT DAVID SAID IS LIKE NO LIFE AT ALL.
translation.ko: 데이빗은 모험 없는 삶은 삶이 아니라고 했다

translation.en: SO WE ELOPED.
[DAVID] I GRADUATED FROM ARCHITECTURE SCHOOL AND GOT A JOB AT A SMALL FIRM.
translation.ko: 난 건축학교를 졸업한 뒤 작은 회사에 취직했다

translation.en: DIANA HELPED SUPPORT US BY SELLING REAL ESTATE.
I SPENT ALL OF MY FREE TIME WORKING ON A DESIGN OF MY OWN.

translation.en: IT SUMMED UP EVERYTHING ABOUT ARCHITECTURE

IT WAS MY DREAM HOUSE.
HAVE I EVER TOLD YOU I LOVE YOU?
NO.
I DO.
STILL?
ALWAYS.

HE USED TO TAKE HIS CLOTHES OFF

translation.en: I DON'T NEED TO DO YOUR FUCKING LAUNDRY!

NOW, HO, HO! O.K., NOW, FINE.

NOW, COME ON. LET'S JUST RELAX.

translation.en: BUT SOMETIMES I'D HAVE TO ASK,

translation.en: WHY ARE WE LOOKING AT A STUPID CAR WASH?
translation.ko: ‘이런 허접한 세차장을 왜 봐야 하는데?’ 그럼 데이빗이 말했다 ‘허접하지 않아’

DON'T JUST USE YOUR EYES."
AT THINGS DIFFERENTLY. HE MADE ME LOOK

translation.en: BECAUSE IT WOULD BE A DAVID MURPHY HOUSE.
translation.ko: 데이빗 머피가 만든 집이잖아 샌터모니카 바닷가에서 멋진 땅을 찾았다

translation.en: I FOUND AN INCREDIBLE PIECE OF PROPERTY IN SANTA MONICA BY THE OCEAN.
IT WAS THE PERFECT SITE FOR DAVID'S HOUSE.
WE'LL BORROW THE MONEY LIKE EVERYBODY ELSE.
translation.ko: 대출 받자 다들 그러잖아 부동산 투기하는 아줌마들이 사는 땅은

translation.en: BUT IT WAS OUR FUTURE, AND I GOT TO BUILD MY HOUSE.

translation.ko: 내 생각엔... 대화를 해보면 잊을지도 몰라

translation.en: WE CAN PUT IT BEHIND US.
GRYPHON'S A BOAT.
HE TOOK YOU TO A BOAT?
WE FLEW TO SANTA BARBARA.
WHAT KIND OF BOAT?
translation.ko: - 샌타바버라로 날아갔었어 - 어떤 배였는데? - 큰 배 - 그다음엔?

translation.en: A BIG BOAT.
AND THEN WHAT? AND THEN NOTHING.
WHERE DID YOU GET THE MATCHES?
translation.ko: 성냥갑은 어디서 났어? 내 가방 뒤졌어?

translation.en: HAVE YOU BEEN GOING THROUGH MY BAG?
translation.ko: 성냥갑은 어디서 났어? 내 가방 뒤졌어? 아니

translation.en: WHY? WHAT'S IN YOUR BAG?
I'M NOT GOING TO TALK ABOUT THIS. I'M NOT GOING TO DO IT.
translation.ko: 얘기 안 해 안 할 거야

translation.en: WHAT?
WHO ARE YOU TALKING TO?
MY MOTHER.
AND, UH, WHAT DID MOM HAVE TO SAY?
NOTHING. SHE WASN'T THERE.
HOW COULD YOU BE TALKING TO HER
IF SHE WASN'T THERE?
translation.ko: 안 받으셨는데 어떻게 통화해? 통화하려고 했는데 안 받으셨어

translation.en: I WAS TRYING TO TALK TO HER,
BUT I DIDN'T REACH HER. SHE WASN'T IN AFTER 10:00?
NO, SHE'S NOT. IF YOU DON'T BELIEVE ME, WOULD YOU LIKE TO TALK TO HER YOURSELF?
WHAT IS THE MATTER WITH YOU?
WHAT IS THAT? YOU KNOW WHAT IT IS.
WHERE DID YOU GET THIS? IN YOUR WALLET.
WELL, I'VE NEVER SEEN IT BEFORE.
IT WAS RIGHT THERE IN THE OLD SECRET COMPARTMENT.
DAVID, I DON'T EVEN USE THAT.
translation.ko: 난 그거 안 써 - 계속 만났어? - 아냐

translation.en: HAVE YOU BEEN SEEING HIM?
NO, I HAVEN'T.
YOU CAN'T STOP THINKING ABOUT HIM, CAN YOU? YOU WON'T LET ME.
WHAT WERE YOU DOING GOING THROUGH MY WALLET?
I DON'T TRUST YOU.
translation.ko: - 당신 못 믿어 - 나도 당신 못 믿어

translation.en: I DON'T TRUST YOU EITHER.
translation.ko: - 당신 못 믿어 - 나도 당신 못 믿어 그럼 비겼네

translation.en: WELL, THEN WE'RE EVEN.
I WANTED TO MAKE SOMETHING GOOD
translation.ko: 뭐든 해야 했다 수많은 잘못을 했지만 하나는 건지고 싶었다

translation.en: OUT OF ALL WE'D DONE WRONG.
translation.ko: 수많은 잘못을 했지만 하나는 건지고 싶었다 난 우리 땅을 되찾기로 결심했다

translation.en: I DECIDED TO TRY AND BUY OUR LAND BACK.
RECENT OFFERS? OVER THERE.
O.K., ALTA VISTA. I JUST NEED THE GUY'S NAME.
translation.ko: 새 주인 이름을 알아내서 팔라고 할 거야

translation.en: I WANT TO MAKE HIM AN OFFER.
translation.ko: 새 주인 이름을 알아내서 팔라고 할 거야 걸리면 나 죽어

translation.en: I'LL GET KILLED FOR THIS, DIANA.
translation.ko: 걸리면 나 죽어 힘들 일은 없을 거야 정말 고마워

translation.en: I DON'T WANT YOU TO GET IN TROUBLE.
translation.ko: 힘들 일은 없을 거야 정말 고마워

translation.en: I REALLY APPRECIATE IT.
543 ALTA VISTA.
THERE IT IS RIGHT THERE. BACK UP. HERE WE GO.
543 ALTA VISTA.
translation.ko: - 올려봐 - 알타 비스타 543번지 “그리폰 랜드 인베스트먼트 존 게이지”

translation.en: OH, MY GOD. LOOK AT THAT.
THIS GUY'S NEVER GOING TO SELL, DIANA.
translation.ko: 이 사람은 안 팔걸 이 사람... TV에서 봤는데

translation.en: I JUST SAW THIS GUY ON TV.
YOU BASTARD! YOU STOLE OUR PROPERTY!
GENTLEMEN, I'D LIKE TO INTRODUCE A FRIEND OF MINE.
translation.ko: 여러분 이쪽은 제 친구인데... 내가 왜 친구야?

translation.en: I'M NOT YOUR FRIEND.
DIANA ADVISED ME ON A PIECE OF PROPERTY.
translation.ko: 다이애나가 땅을 소개해줘서... 뻥 치지 마! 훔쳤잖아! 돌려줘!

translation.en: THAT'S BULLSHIT. YOU'RE A LIAR.
YOU TOOK IT I WANT IT BACK.
translation.ko: 뻥 치지 마! 훔쳤잖아! 돌려줘! 이러지 말고... 아뇨, 괜찮아요

translation.en: I TELL YOU WHAT-- CAN WE HAVE A LITTLE--
translation.ko: 이러지 말고... 아뇨, 괜찮아요 알아서 할 테니 걱정 마요

translation.en: THAT'S O.K. EVERYTHING'S FINE. EVERYTHING'S UNDER CONTROL.
translation.ko: 알아서 할 테니 걱정 마요 알겠습니다

translation.en: EXCUSE ME.
I'M TAKING IT OFF.
WAIT A MINUTE. DID YOU JUST WANT TO HURT ME?
NONSENSE. I THINK YOU'RE WONDERFUL.
translation.ko: - 좋은 여자한테 왜요? - 어떻게 그럴 수 있죠?

translation.en: THAT WAS OUR HOUSE. HOW COULD YOU DO THAT?
translation.ko: - 좋은 여자한테 왜요? - 어떻게 그럴 수 있죠? - 내가 먼저 가졌으니까 - 다시 팔아요

translation.en: I GOT THERE FIRST.
I WANT YOU TO SELL IT BACK TO ME.
translation.ko: - 내가 먼저 가졌으니까 - 다시 팔아요 - 감당 안 될 텐데 - 백만 달러라도요?

translation.en: YOU CAN'T AFFORD IT.
translation.ko: - 감당 안 될 텐데 - 백만 달러라도요?

translation.en: HOW'S A MILLION DOLLARS?
translation.ko: - 감당 안 될 텐데 - 백만 달러라도요? 2백만 달러요

translation.en: THE PRICE IS 2.
IF I HAD 2, THE PRICE WOULD BE 4, RIGHT?
translation.ko: 내게 2백만이 있었으면 4백만 불렀겠죠 난 가능성을 보고 산 거요

translation.en: I SAW AN OPPORTUNITY AND I TOOK IT.
translation.ko: 난 가능성을 보고 산 거요 당신은 돈과 직감이 있었지만 좀 늦었을 뿐이죠

translation.en: YOU HAD THE MONEY, YOU HAD THE RIGHT INSTINCTS,
translation.ko: 당신은 돈과 직감이 있었지만 좀 늦었을 뿐이죠

translation.en: BUT YOU WERE TOO LATE, THAT'S ALL.
translation.ko: 당신은 돈과 직감이 있었지만 좀 늦었을 뿐이죠 - 내 밑에서 일해요 - 재수 없어

translation.en: I WANT YOU TO WORK FOR ME.
YOU GO TO HELL.
translation.ko: - 내 밑에서 일해요 - 재수 없어 - 진심이오 - 싫어요

translation.en: LISTEN, I MEAN IT.
NEVER.
BECAUSE I HATE YOU. NO, YOU DON'T.
YOU WISH YOU HATED ME.
HEY, D.
YOU LOOK AWFUL.
WHERE YOU BEEN?
UH, I'LL TELL YOU ABOUT IT.
translation.ko: - 어디 갔었어? - 말할게 와인 좀 마시고

translation.en: I'M JUST GOING TO HAVE SOME WINE FIRST.
DO YOU WANT SOME?
SO WHERE YOU BEEN?
LAST NIGHT I STAYED UP FOR HOURS TRYING TO FIGURE A WAY OUT OF THIS MESS.
translation.ko: 우리 문제를 해결할 방법을 찾느라 어제 밤새웠어

translation.en: AND TODAY?
AND TODAY I SAW GAGE.
THANK YOU FOR YOUR TRUST, DAVID, AND FOR LISTENING.
DID YOU FUCK HIM? NO.
BUT YOU WANTED TO, RIGHT?
translation.ko: 자고 싶었지? 부잣집 아저씨들 많은 데서 벌건 대낮에 만났어

translation.en: DAVID, I MET HIM IN BROAD DAYLIGHT, SURROUNDED BY A BUNCH OR RICH ASSHOLES.
translation.ko: 부잣집 아저씨들 많은 데서 벌건 대낮에 만났어

translation.en: I DON'T BELIEVE YOU.
translation.ko: - 안 믿어 - 그 사람이 우리 땅을 샀대

translation.en: DAVID, HE BOUGHT OUR PROPERTY, O.K.?
translation.ko: - 안 믿어 - 그 사람이 우리 땅을 샀대 그래서 만났어

translation.en: THAT'S WHY I WENT TO SEE HIM.
I WANTED TO FIND SOME WAY TO GET IT BACK.
YOU--YOU HAVE NO REASON TO BE JEALOUS. I HATE HIM.
translation.ko: 질투할 필요 없어 그놈 미워 죽겠으니까

translation.en: D, YOU GOTTA TELL ME WHAT HAPPENED ON THAT BOAT.
translation.ko: 그 배에서 무슨 일이 있었는지 말해 - 이러지 마, 제발! - 말해줘

translation.en: DAVID, DON'T DO THIS! TELL ME WHAT HAPPENED ON THAT BOAT.
WHY? 'CAUSE I WANT TO KNOW.
ALL RIGHT, I'LL TELL YOU. THE MAN WAS A FUCKING STALLION.
translation.ko: 그래, 말할게 그 남자는 완전 종마야

translation.en: IS THAT WHAT YOU WANT ME TO SAY? WE DID IT ALL NIGHT LONG?
DOES THAT DO IT FOR YOU?
translation.ko: 궁금한 게 이거야? 밤새 섹스했어 - 진짜야? - 진짜? 그딴 건 상관없잖아

translation.en: IS THAT THE TRUTH? YOU DON'T WANT THE FUCKING TRUTH.
YOU WANT ME TO LIE.
translation.ko: 거짓말하라는 거면서! 엄청 못했다고 하란 거지?

translation.en: YOU WANT ME TO SAY HE'S AWFUL, SO I'M GOING TO TELL YOU HE'S AWFUL,
translation.ko: 못했다고 해도 안 믿을 텐데 어떻게 이겨?

translation.en: AND YOU WON'T BELIEVE ME. HOW CAN I WIN?
JUST TELL ME THE TRUTH, D.
translation.ko: 진실을 말하면 돼 그냥 섹스였어 사랑이 아니라 섹스

translation.en: IT WAS SEX, DAVID, JUST SEX--NOT LOVE, JUST SEX.
WELL, WAS IT GOOD SEX?
DON'T DO THIS, DAVID.
translation.ko: - 좋았어? - 이러지 마 그냥 말해, 좋았어?

translation.en: CAN YOU JUST TELL ME THAT, D?
WAS IT GOOD? WHAT ARE YOU HESITATING FOR?
JUST TELL ME. WAS IT GOOD?
translation.ko: 뭘 망설여? 그냥 말해, 좋았어? 좋았느냐고

translation.en: WAS IT GOOD? WAS HE GOOD?
YES.
DAVID.
HEY, DON'T YOU...DON'T YOU TELL ME IT WAS JUST SEX,
translation.ko: 그건 그냥 섹스가 아냐 처음부터 그 자식한테 끌리고 있었으니까

translation.en: BECAUSE YOU WERE ATTRACTED TO HIM ALL ALONG.
translation.ko: 처음부터 그 자식한테 끌리고 있었으니까 아닌 거 알잖아 당신을 위해 한 일이야

translation.en: YOU KNOW THAT'S BULLSHIT.
translation.ko: 아닌 거 알잖아 당신을 위해 한 일이야

translation.en: DAVID, I DID IT FOR YOU.
translation.ko: 아닌 거 알잖아 당신을 위해 한 일이야 날 위해서가 아니라 당신을 위해서겠지!

translation.en: DON'T YOU TELL ME YOU DID IT FOR ME. YOU DID IT FOR YOURSELF.
THAT'S A LIE.
YOU WERE DYING TO DO IT! THAT'S A LIE! I WOULD NEVER DO THIS FOR MYSELF.
translation.ko: 아냐! 당신만 아니었으면 그런 짓 안 했을 거야

translation.en: IT WAS ALL FOR YOU. DON'T LIE TO ME! YOU WERE ATTRACTED TO HIM!
I KNEW SOMETHING LIKE THIS WAS GOING TO HAPPEN.
I GUESS YOU, UH, MAKE A DEAL WITH THE DEVIL,
translation.ko: 악마와 거래를 했으니 대가를 치르는 거지

translation.en: AND EVENTUALLY YOU PAY THE PRICE, RIGHT?
translation.ko: 악마와 거래를 했으니 대가를 치르는 거지 고맙다

translation.en: THANKS, JEREMY. COMING FROM THE MAN
translation.ko: 고맙다 악마와 거래를 성사시켜준 놈이 그런 말을 하니 위안되네

translation.en: WHO CLOSED THE DEAL WITH THE DEVIL, THAT'S VERY COMFORTING.
translation.ko: 악마와 거래를 성사시켜준 놈이 그런 말을 하니 위안되네

translation.en: GREEN.
OH, HI, DI. I'M NOT HERE.
YEAH, HE'S RIGHT HERE.
YOU WANT TO SPEAK TO HIM? NO. I--I DON'T WANT TO TALK TO HIM.
LOOK, SWEETIE, HE LOVES YOU.
YOU LOVE HIM.
translation.ko: 데이빗과 다이애나는 서로 사랑해요 문제는 해결해야죠

translation.en: YOU GOT TO TRY AND WORK THIS OUT.
IT'S ALL PRETTY SIMPLE, RIGHT?
translation.ko: 간단한 문제잖아요 둘 사이는 변호사인 나도 망칠 수 없어요

translation.en: EVEN I CAN'T SCREW UP. THIS IS A DEAL
translation.ko: 둘 사이는 변호사인 나도 망칠 수 없어요 돈 다 가지라고 하세요

translation.en: TELL HIM HE CAN KEEP THE MONEY.
I DON'T WANT ANY OF IT.
DAVEY, SHE SAID SHE DOESN'T WANT THE MONEY.
WELL, I DON'T WANT THE MONEY EITHER.
I'LL TAKE IT. I MEAN, IF NOBODY ELSE WANTS IT.
HI, ELIZABETH.
THE NEXT FEW WEEKS [DIANA] WITHOUT DAVID FELT LIKE MONTHS.
translation.ko: 데이빗 없는 몇 주는 몇 달 같았다

translation.en: I GOT VERY GOOD AT STARING AT WALLS.
DIANA. DIANA.
THE RECESSION HAS ENDED.
translation.ko: 다이애나 불경기는 끝이야 천만 달러짜리 집을 사겠다는 남자가 왔어

translation.en: THERE'S A FELLA OUT THERE WANTS TO SEE $10 MILLION HOMES.
translation.ko: 천만 달러짜리 집을 사겠다는 남자가 왔어

translation.en: THERE IS A GOD.
FIND SOMEONE ELSE.
translation.ko: 딴 사람 시키세요 딴 사람 시키라고? 미쳤어?

translation.en: FIND SOMEONE ELSE?
ARE YOU NUTS?
translation.ko: 딴 사람 시키라고? 미쳤어? 천만 달러짜리 집이면 수수료가 얼만데?

translation.en: DO YOU KNOW WHAT THE COMMISSION IS
ON $10 MILLION?
I CAN'T DO IT.
translation.ko: - 전 못 해요 - 해야 해 여기서 자네가 최고잖아

translation.en: YOU HAVE TO DO IT. YOU'RE THE BEST ONE I HAVE.
translation.ko: 여기서 자네가 최고잖아 나한텐 자네밖에 없어 나머지는 들러리일 뿐이지

translation.en: YOU'RE THE ONLY ONE I HAVE. THE OTHERS ARE ALL ON CARAVAN.
translation.ko: 나한텐 자네밖에 없어 나머지는 들러리일 뿐이지

translation.en: I'M SORRY, MR. LANGFORD. I CAN'T.
DIANA, I WOULD NEVER
translation.ko: 다이애나, 싫다는 걸 억지로 시킬 생각은

translation.en: DREAM OF FORCING YOU TO DO ANYTHING
translation.ko: 다이애나, 싫다는 걸 억지로 시킬 생각은 추호도 없어

translation.en: AGAINST YOUR WILL.
EXCEPT THIS ONE TIME.
NOW MOVE YOUR ASS OR YOU'RE FIRED.
IF YOU THINK THIS IS GOING TO WORK, YOU UNDERESTIMATE ME.
translation.ko: 이게 통할 줄 알았다면 큰 오산이에요

translation.en: YOU ARE TRULY BEAUTIFUL.
WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU'RE DOING?
LOOKING FOR A HOUSE.
WELL, THERE'S BEL-AIR, HOLMBY HILLS, BENEDICT CANYON, PACIFIC PALISADES--
translation.ko: 벨 에어, 홈비 힐스 베네딕트 캐년, 퍼시픽 팰리세이즈

translation.en: WHERE WOULD YOU LIKE TO GO FIRST? PARIS.
1120 BEL-AIR ROAD, PLEASE.
THE CEILINGS ARE FRENCH GOTHIC,
RENAISSANCE PAINTINGS, AS YOU CAN SEE,
PARQUET FLOORS THROUGHOUT.
THE BATHROOMS ARE ITALIAN MARBLE.
THIS IS THE MASTER BATH.
WHY DIDN'T YOU RETURN ANY OF MY CALLS?
DO YOU LIKE IT?
NO.
30 MILLION, MINIMUM.
YOU THINK? I KNOW.
WELL, LET'S LOOK AT IT.
translation.ko: - 확실해요 - 그럼 봅시다 - 매물 아니에요 - 안 파는 건 없소

translation.en: IT'S NOT FOR SALE. EVERYTHING'S FOR SALE.
translation.ko: - 매물 아니에요 - 안 파는 건 없소

translation.en: THIS IS YOUR HOUSE, ISN'T IT?
DO YOU LIKE IT?
WELL, IT'S, UM, CERTAINLY BEAUTIFUL.
WHAT DO YOU THINK IT NEEDS? TELL ME. HONESTLY.
I THINK IT NEEDS A LIFE.
I THINK IT NEEDS FURNITURE AND... MAYBE A COUPLE OF DOGS
AND FLOWERS. IT NEEDS YOU.
JUST FORGET IT. THIS JUST-- THIS JUST WON'T WORK.
WHY NOT?
BECAUSE FROM WHERE WE STARTED, WE'VE GOT NOWHERE TO GO.
translation.ko: 첫 단추부터 잘못 끼웠으니 갈 데가 없어요

translation.en: YOU DON'T KNOW THAT.
I'VE NEVER STARTED THIS WAY EITHER.
translation.ko: 나도 이런 식으로 시작한 적 없어요

translation.en: I NEED YOU.
NO.
YOU COLLECT THINGS.
DON'T YOU?
SOMETIMES.
EVEN IF YOU WERE EXTREMELY RICH AND EXTREMELY SMART,
CAN YOU BE PRESIDENT?
NO. NO.
translation.ko: - 대통령 될 수 있나요? - 아뇨 - 대통령 못 해요? - 네

translation.en: YOU COULDN'T BE PRESIDENT?
NO. NO.
I TOOK A SECOND JOB TEACHING CITIZENSHIP JUST TO KEEP MYSELF BUSY.
translation.ko: 바쁘게 일하려고 부업으로 시민권 강의를 맡기로 했다

translation.en: JU, WHERE WERE YOU BORN? I WAS BORN IN SEOUL, KOREA.
O.K., WHERE WAS SHE BORN?
[CLASS] SHE WAS BORN IN SEOUL, KOREA.
translation.ko: - 한국 서울이요 - 한국 서울이요 주, 여기서 낳은 아이가 있나요?

translation.en: NOW, JU, DO YOU HAVE... SI NO ES VENDEDOR DE DROGAS,
WHERE WERE YOU BORN, MIGUEL?
SORRY.
WELCOME BACK. WHERE WERE YOU BORN?
[SPANISH PRONUNCIATION] CUBA. CUBA.
SO, HOW DO WE SAY CUBA IN AMERICA?
CUE-BA.
HI.
WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
ISN'T THIS THE CITIZENSHIP CLASS?
translation.ko: - 여긴 웬일이에요? - 시민권 수업 맞죠? - 네 - 앉아도 될까요?

translation.en: YES.
IT'S FULL.
O.K.
UH...
CUBA. CUBA. THANK YOU.
O.K., UM...
EXCUSE ME. IS THERE SOMETHING
YOU'D LIKE TO SHARE WITH US?
translation.ko: 잠깐만요 무슨 할 말 있으세요? 선생님이 멋진 여자라고 했습니다

translation.en: I WAS JUST SAYING THAT YOU'RE AN AMAZING WOMAN.
AND--AND BEAUTIFUL.
AND TALENTED.
OOH! AND I AM CRAZY ABOUT HER.
YOU'RE FULL OF SURPRISES, AREN'T YOU?
translation.ko: 깜짝깜짝 놀라게 하시네요 열심히 노력 중이오

translation.en: I'M TRYING LIKE HELL.
I THINK, UH, MAYBE YOU SHOULD GO.
YOU WANT ME TO GO? NO! NO!
NICE PEOPLE.
THEY WANT THE DREAM.
WELL, THEY SAW IT IN THE FLESH TONIGHT.
YOU HAVE CHALK ON YOUR FACE.
I HAVE SOMETHING I WANT TO SHOW YOU.
I DIDN'T KNOW WHETHER YOU LIKED BIG ONES
OH, YOU'RE SO BEAUTIFUL. COME HERE.
I DIDN'T HAVE MUCH TIME TO DO ANYTHING ELSE.
BUT...IT'S A START.
DANCE?
UM, I SHOULD GO.
I REMEMBER ONCE WHEN I WAS YOUNG
AND I WAS COMING BACK FROM SOMEPLACE--
translation.ko: 영화 보고 오던 길이던가 어쨌든 집에 가는 길에

translation.en: A MOVIE OR SOMETHING-- I WAS ON THE SUBWAY.
AND THERE WAS A GIRL SITTING ACROSS FROM ME,
translation.ko: 맞은편에 어떤 여자애가 앉아있었는데 그 애 옷이

translation.en: AND SHE WAS WEARING THIS DRESS
translation.ko: 맞은편에 어떤 여자애가 앉아있었는데 그 애 옷이 단추가 여기까지 채워져 있었죠

translation.en: THAT WAS BUTTONED CLEAR UP RIGHT TO HERE.
SHE WAS THE MOST BEAUTIFUL THING I'D EVER SEEN.
AND I WAS SHY THEN,
SO WHEN SHE WOULD LOOK AT ME, I WOULD LOOK AWAY.
translation.ko: 그 애가 날 쳐다보면 난 딴 데를 보고
